attributes.action: give people on EMA £50.65 a week the same as those on the dole.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People in higher education who recieve EMA are working for a better career by achieving qualifictaions. Unlike the people recieving £50 per week for doing nothing for society. We believe it should be raised for students to recieve the same.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
